CVE-2011-0001.title: Linux SCSI target framework (tgt) iscsi_rx_handler() denial of service
CVE-2011-0001.body: Linux SCSI target framework (tgt) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a double-free error in the iscsi_rx_handler() function. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the tgtd daemon to crash.Apply the patch for your distribution. See References.

CVE-2011-0002.title: libuser password security bypass
CVE-2011-0002.body: libuser could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the setting of a default user password. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the authentication process with a well-known password.Upgrade to the latest version of libuser (0.57 or later), available from the fedora HOSTED Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0003.title: MediaWiki frames clickjacking
CVE-2011-0003.body: MediaWiki could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim, caused by an error when processing data via frames. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of MediaWiki (1.16.1 or later), available from the MediaWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0005.title: Joomla! ordering cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0005.body: Joomla! is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the ordering parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Joomla! (1.5.22 or later), available from the Joomla! Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0010.title: Sudo group ID privilege escalation
CVE-2011-0010.body: Sudo could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the failure to restrict access to changes of the group ID (GID). If Sudo is configured using a certain syntax, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the sudo -g command to gain elevated privileges on the system and change into a restricted GID without entering a password.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Mercurial Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-0011.title: QEMU VNC password security bypass
CVE-2011-0011.body: QEMU could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a failure to reject access when a blank VNC password is configured. An attacker to exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0017.title: Exim open_log privilege escalation
CVE-2011-0017.body: Exim could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the incorrect checking of the return values of the setuid() and setgid() calls by the open_log() function. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to append malicious content to arbitrary files with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Exim (4.74 or later), available from the Exim Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0018.title: OpenVAS Manager email() command execution
CVE-2011-0018.body: OpenVAS Manager could allow a remote attacker execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation by the email() function. By sending a specially-crafted request using the Greenbone Security Assistant web application, a remote attacker could inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system.Refer to OpenVAS Security Advisory (OVSA20110118) for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0020.title: Pango pango_ft2_font_render_box_glyph() buffre overflow
CVE-2011-0020.body: Pango is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the pango_ft2_font_render_box_glyph() function. By persuading a victim to load a specially-crafted font file using Pango's FreeType2 backend, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0021.title: VLC Media Player CDG code execution
CVE-2011-0021.body: VLC Media Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an array indexing error in the DecodeTileBlock() and DecodeScroll() functions within the CDG decoder module. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted CD+G (CD+Graphics) media file, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the VideoLAN GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-0025.title: OpenJDK IcedTea plugin JAR security bypass
CVE-2011-0025.body: The OpenJDK IcedTea plugin could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper handling of the JAR signature. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the signature verification process and gain unauthorized access to the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0030.title: Microsoft Windows CSRSS privilege escalation
CVE-2011-0030.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper termination of user processes when a user logs off of a system by Windows Client/Server Run-time Subsystem (CSRSS). By running a specially-crafted application, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0031.title: Microsoft Windows VBScript and JScript information disclosure
CVE-2011-0031.body: The Microsoft Windows VBScript and JScript scripting engines could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a memory corruption error when processing scripts. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read restricted data and obtain sensitive information.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0033.title: Microsoft Windows OpenType Compact Font Format code execution
CVE-2011-0033.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper validation of the values read in from specially-crafted OpenType fonts by the OpenType Compact Font Format (CFF) driver. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site containing a malicious OpenType font, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0035.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer code execution
CVE-2011-0035.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error when handling objects that have not been correctly initialized or have been deleted. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0036.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer code execution
CVE-2011-0036.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error when handling objects that have not been correctly initialized or have been deleted. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0037.title: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine privilege escalation
CVE-2011-0037.body: Microsoft could allow a local attacker gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the Malware Protection Engine. By tricking a vulnerable application to scan a specially crafted registry location, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM-level privileges.Refer to Microsoft Security Advisory (2491888) for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0040.title: Microsoft Windows Active Directory denial of service
CVE-2011-0040.body: Microsoft Windows is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper validation of service principal names (SPN) by Active Directory. By sending a specially-crafted request to update the service principal name (SPN), a local attacker with admin privileges could exploit this vulnerability to exhaust the space stack to cause the service to stop responding.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS11-005. See References.

CVE-2011-0043.title: Microsoft Windows Kerberos checksum privilege escalation
CVE-2011-0043.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a local, authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the supporting of an unkeyed checksum by the Microsoft Kerberos implementation. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to generate a malicious service ticket to obtain a token and gain elevated privileges on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0045.title: Microsoft Windows kernel privilege escalation
CVE-2011-0045.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an integer truncation error when memory is allocated by the kernel. By persuading a victim to browse a directory containing a specially-crafted application, a local attacker with valid login credentials could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS11-011. See References.

CVE-2011-0046.title: Bugzilla unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2011-0046.body: Bugzilla is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Bugzilla (3.2.10, 3.4.10, or 3.6.4 or later), available from the Bugzilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0047.title: MediaWiki CSS comments cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0047.body: MediaWiki is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using CSS comments to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of MediaWiki (1.16.2 or later), available from the MediaWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0048.title: Bugzilla URL cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0048.body: Bugzilla is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a URL in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Bugzilla (3.2.10, 3.4.10, or 3.6.4 or later), available from the Bugzilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0049.title: Majordomo _list_file_get() directory traversal
CVE-2011-0049.body: Majordomo could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the _list_file_get() function containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the help command to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Majordomo (20110130 or later), available from the Majordomo 2 Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0063.title: Majordomo _list_file_get() directory traversal
CVE-2011-0063.body: Majordomo could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the _list_file_get() function containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the help command to view arbitrary files on the system.Refer to Bugzilla@Mozilla Bug 631307 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0091.title: Microsoft Windows Kerberos spoofing
CVE-2011-0091.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a local attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the failure to enforce the encryption standards included in Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to force a downgrade of Kerberos authentication and impersonate a valid users' credentials or to forge all of the Kerberos traffic in a compromised session.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0092.title: Microsoft Visio object code execution
CVE-2011-0092.body: Microsoft Visio could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper validation of objects when opening Visio files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Visio file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0093.title: Microsoft Visio data type code execution
CVE-2011-0093.body: Microsoft Visio could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper validation of data types when opening Visio files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Visio file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0096.title: Microsoft Windows MHTML information disclosure
CVE-2011-0096.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the way MHTML (MIME Encapsulation of Aggregate HTML) interprets MIME-formatted requests for content blocks within a document. By persuading a victim to click a specially-crafted "MHTML:" link, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using Internet Explorer to inject a client-side script in the user's Internet Explorer instance to spoof content and obtain sensitive information.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0157.title: Apple iOS WebKit unspecified code execution
CVE-2011-0157.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error in WebKit. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (4.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0158.title: Apple iOS MobileSafari denial of service
CVE-2011-0158.body: Apple iOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in MobileSafari. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site containing JavaScript that repeatedly causes another application on the device to launch using a URL handler, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the victim's browser to exit.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (4.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0161.title: Apple iOS Attr.style accessor code execution
CVE-2011-0161.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a cross-origin issue in WebKit when handling the Attr.style accessor. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject an arbitrary Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) into another document.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (4.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0162.title: Apple iOS Wi-Fi frames denial of service
CVE-2011-0162.body: Apple iOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper bounds checking when handling Wi-Fi frames. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to restart.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (4.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0163.title: Apple iOS cache denial of service
CVE-2011-0163.body: Apple iOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a cache poisoning error in WebKit when handling cached resources. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to prevent other sites from requesting specific resources.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (4.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0166.title: Apple Safari HTML5 information disclosure
CVE-2011-0166.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a cross-origin issue in WebKit when handling HTML5 drag and drop operations. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and dragging content across the page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (5.0.4 or later), available from the Apple Safari Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0169.title: Apple Safari window.console._inspectorCommandLineAPI cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0169.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by a cross-origin issue in WebKit when handling the window.console._inspectorCommandLineAPI property. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Safari (5.0.4 or later), available from the Apple Safari Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0206.title: Apple Mac OS X ICU buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0206.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by ICU (International Components for Unicode) when handling uppercase strings. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2011-004 or upgrade to the latest version of Mac OS X (10.6.8 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0258.title: Apple QuickTime mp4v buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0258.body: Apple QuickTime is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling mp4v codec information. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted movie file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple QuickTime (7.7 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0262.title: HP Openview Network Node Manager ovutil.dll module
CVE-2011-0262.body: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ovutil.dll module. By sending a jovgraph.exe CGI program using a HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02621 SSRT100352 rev.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0263.title: HP Openview Network Node Manager ovas.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0263.body: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ovas.exe component. By sending a Source Node or Destination Node variable using a POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02621 SSRT100352 rev.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0264.title: HP Openview Network Node Manager ovutil.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0264.body: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ovutil.dll library. By sending a COOKIE variable using a GET request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02621 SSRT100352 rev.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0265.title: HP Openview Network Node Manager data_select1 buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0265.body: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the nnmrptconfig.exe CGI executable. By sending an overly long data_select1 parameter using a POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02621 SSRT100352 rev.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0267.title: HP Openview Network Node Manager schdParams buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0267.body: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the nnmrptconfig.exe CGI executable. By sending an oversized schdParams or nameParams parameter using a POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02621 SSRT100352 rev.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0269.title: HP Openview Network Node Manager schd_select1 buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0269.body: HP Openview Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the nnmrptconfig.exe CGI executable. By sending a schd_select1 parameter using a POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02621 SSRT100352 rev.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0271.title: HP Openview Network Node Manager CGI command execution
CVE-2011-0271.body: HP Openview Network Node Manager could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of input by unspecified CGI scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary commands on the system with the privilegesof the victim.Refer to HPSBMA02621 SSRT100352 rev.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0274.title: HP Business Availability Center and Business Service Management cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0274.body: HP Business Availability Center (BAC) and Business Service Management (BSM) are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to HPSBMA02622 SSRT100342 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0281.title: MIT Kerberos LDAP descriptor denial of service
CVE-2011-0281.body: MIT Kerberos is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a file descriptor leak in the Key Distribution Center (KDC) daemon when configured with an LDAP back end. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the daemon to hang.Refer to MITKRB5-SA-2011-002 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0284.title: MIT Kerberos perpare_error_as() code execution
CVE-2011-0284.body: MIT Kerberos could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a double-free error in the perpare_error_as() function in the within the Key Distribution Center (KDC) daemon. If the Public Key Cryptography for Initial Authentication (PKINIT) capability is enabled, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the daemon to crash.Refer to MITKRB5-SA-2011-003 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0290.title: BlackBerry Enterprise Server Collaboration Service spoofing
CVE-2011-0290.body: BlackBerry Enterprise Server could allow a remote attacker conduct spoofing attacks, caused by an error within the authentication mechanism of the BlackBerry Collaboration Service component. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to impersonate another BlackBerry Collaboration Service user, send and receive messages and gain unauthorized access to a valid user's enterprise instant messaging contact list.Refer to Blackberry Security Advisory KB28524 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0291.title: BlackBerry PlayBook tablet privilege escalation
CVE-2011-0291.body: BlackBerry PlayBook tablet could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the File Sharing service via a USB connection to a system running BlackBerry Desktop Software. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify a backup archive file and gain root privileges on the vulnerable system.Refer to Blackberry Security Advisory KB29191 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0310.title: IBM WebSphere MQ message header buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0310.body: IBM WebSphere MQ is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking during message handling. By sending a message contain a specially-crafted header field, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with MQM privileges or cause the application to crash.For WebSphere MQ 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.1.4 or later) or APAR IZ77607. See References.

CVE-2011-0311.title: IBM Runtimes for Java Technology class file parser denial of service
CVE-2011-0311.body: IBM Runtimes for Java Technology is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the class file parser. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted class file containing an invalid attribute length field to cause a segmentation fault.For Java 1.4.2: Apply the latest Fix Pack (1.4.2 SR13 FP10 or later) or APAR PM42551. See References. For Runtimes for Java Technology 5.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (5.0.0 SR13 or later) or APAR IZ89620. See References. For Runtimes for Java Technology 6.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.0.0 SR10 or later) or APAR IZ89602. See References.

CVE-2011-0314.title: IBM WebSphere MQ message buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0314.body: WebSphere MQ is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the message handling code. By sending a specially-crafted invalid message, a remote attacker with authorized access to connect to the queue manager and permission to put a message to a queue could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the queue manager to crash. Note: For messages originating on a remote queue manager, and then arriving over a channel, authorization checks will have been performed on the queue manager handling the initial put.For WebSphere MQ 6.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.0.2.11 or later) or APAR IZ81294. See References. For WebSphere MQ 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.1.4 or later) or APAR IZ81294. See References. --OR-- For Workaround information: Ensure best practice security procedures are applied to all WebSphere MQ objects. See References.

CVE-2011-0315.title: WebSphere Application Server Web Container cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0315.body: WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when a given application does not have a correct error page defined. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a Web Container error message to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For WebSphere Application Server 6.1: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.1.0.35 or later) or APAR PM18512. See References. For WebSphere Application Server 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.15 or later) or APAR PM18512. See References.

CVE-2011-0316.title: WebSphere Application Server console servlet information disclosure
CVE-2011-0316.body: WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper access controls on Administration console servlets. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a direct request to obtain various status information.For WebSphere Application Server 6.1: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.1.0.35 or later) or APAR PM24372. See References. For WebSphere Application Server 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.15 or later) or APAR PM24372. See References.

CVE-2011-0324.title: SigPlus Pro ActiveX control NewPath buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0324.body: The SigPlus Pro ActiveX control is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long NewPath argument to the SetLocalIniFilePath() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of SigPlus Pro ActiveX control (4.29 or later), available from the Topaz Systems Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0324.title: SigPlus Pro ActiveX control KeyString buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0324.body: The SigPlus Pro ActiveX control is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string argument to the KeyString method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of SigPlus Pro ActiveX control (4.29 or later), available from the Topaz Systems Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0341.title: MuPDF plugin for Firefox pdfmoz_onmouse() buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0341.body: The MuPDF plugin for Firefox is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the pdfmoz_onmouse() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-0346.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer ReleaseInterface() code execution
CVE-2011-0346.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error in the ReleaseInterface() function within the mshtml.dll library when handling circular references between JScript objects and DOM objects. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-0348.title: Cisco Content Services Gateway policy security bypass
CVE-2011-0348.body: Cisco Content Services Gateway could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when checking access policies. By sending specially-crafted HTTP packets, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to restricted sites.Refer to cisco-sa-20110126-csg2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0364.title: Cisco Security Agent webagent.exe file upload
CVE-2011-0364.body: Cisco Security Agent could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the Management Center web interface (webagent.exe). By sending a specially-crafted POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.Refer to cisco-sa-20110216-csa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0377.title: Cisco TelePresence Endpoint IP address denial of service
CVE-2011-0377.body: Cisco TelePresence Endpoint is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when handling SOAP requests. By initiating a three-way handshake, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted SOAP request to TCP port 8081 or TCP port 9501 to inject an IP address into a configuration file and cause the device to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-telepresence-cts for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0380.title: Cisco TelePresence Manager SOAP security bypass
CVE-2011-0380.body: Cisco TelePresence Manager could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when handling SOAP requests. By initiating a three-way handshake, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request to TCP port 8080 or 8443 to call arbitrary methods within the SOAP interface.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-telepresence-ctsman for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0383.title: Cisco TelePresence Recording Server Java unauthorized access
CVE-2011-0383.body: Cisco TelePresence Recording Server could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system. By initiating a three-way handshake, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request to TCP ports 80, 443 or 8080 using a Java Servlet framework to perform unauthorized administrative actions.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-telepresence-ctrs or cisco-sa-20110223-telepresence-ctms for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0386.title: Cisco TelePresence Recording Server XML-RPC file overwrite
CVE-2011-0386.body: Cisco TelePresence Recording Server could allow a remote attacker to overwrite arbitrary files, caused by an error in XML-RPC. By initiating a three-way handshake, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request to TCP port 12102 or 12104 to overwrite data and gain control over the data.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-telepresence-ctrs for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0389.title: Cisco TelePresence Multipoint Switch Real-Time Transport Control Protocol denial of service
CVE-2011-0389.body: Cisco TelePresence Multipoint Switch is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing Real-Time Transport Control Protocol (RTCP) packets. By sending a specially-crafted RTCP packet to a listening RTCP control port, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the call control process to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-telepresence-ctms for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0392.title: Cisco TelePresence Recording Server XML-RPC security bypass
CVE-2011-0392.body: Cisco TelePresence Recording Server could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the XML-RPC interface. By initiating a three-way handshake, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request to TCP port 8080 to perform unauthorized actions.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-telepresence-ctrs for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0393.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances packet buffer denial of service
CVE-2011-0393.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances (ASA) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a packet buffer exhaustion error within the transparent firewall mode. By sending a specially-crafted IPv6 traffic, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the appliance to stop forwarding traffic.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0394.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module and Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances SCCP denial of service
CVE-2011-0394.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) and Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances (ASA) are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error during SCCP inspection. By sending a specially-crafted SCCP message that traverses the network, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-fwsm or cisco-sa-20110223-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0395.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances processing RIP updates denial of service
CVE-2011-0395.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances (ASA) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing RIP updates. If global media termination address is configured and RIP and the Cisco Phone Proxy features are enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0396.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances CA server unauthorized access
CVE-2011-0396.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances (ASA) could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system, caused by an error when the device is configured as local CA server. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to a file system.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0398.title: Piwik Piwik_Common::getIP security bypass
CVE-2011-0398.body: Piwik could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to properly determine the client IP address by the Piwik_Common::getIP function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a private address to bypass the intended geolocation and logging functionality.Upgrade to the latest version of Piwik Web site (1.1 or later), available from the Piwik Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0401.title: Piwik sessions denial of service
CVE-2011-0401.body: Piwik is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the failure to properly limit the number of files stored under tmp/sessions/. By establishing multiple sessions, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Piwik Web site (1.1 or later), available from the Piwik Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0404.title: NetSupport Manager client buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0404.body: NetSupport Manager is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the NetSupport Manager client when handling packets. By sending a specially-crafted packet to TCP port 5405, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-0405.title: PhpGedView module.php file include
CVE-2011-0405.body: PhpGedView could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the module.php script using the pgvaction parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the PhpGedView SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-0406.title: KingView HistorySvr.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0406.body: KingView is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by HistorySvr.exe. By sending a specially-crafted packet to TCP port 777, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability KingView 6.53 patch nettransdll.dll, available from the KingView Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0407.title: Phenotype CMS URI SQL injection
CVE-2011-0407.body: Phenotype CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using a URI, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-0408.title: libpng png_set_rgb_to_gray() buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0408.body: libpng is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the png_set_rgb_to_gray() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PNG file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of libpng (1.5.1beta01 or later), available from the libpng Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0410.title: ScrumWorks Basic Base64 information disclosure
CVE-2011-0410.body: ScrumWorks Basic could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the transmittal of the server credentials as Base64-encoded text. By sniffing the network, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-0411.title: Multiple vendors STARTTLS command execution
CVE-2011-0411.body: Multiple vendors could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error within the STARTTLS implementation when upgrading from plaintext to a TLS connection. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to inject SMTP commands during the plaintext protocol phase and executed during the ciphertext protocol phase.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0413.title: ISC DHCP DHCPv6 denial of service
CVE-2011-0413.body: ISC DHCP is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an assertion error when processing DHCPv6 messages for a previously declined address. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of ISC DHCP (4.1.2-P1, 4.1-ESV-R1, and 4.2.1b1 or later), available from the Internet Systems Consortium Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0427.title: Tor unspecified buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0427.body: Tor is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By using unknown attack vectors, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Tor (0.2.1.29 or later), available from the Tor Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0434.title: Domain Technologie Control cid SQL injection
CVE-2011-0434.body: Domain Technologie Control is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the bw_per_month.php and client/bw_per_month.php scripts using the cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Domain Technologie Control GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-0435.title: Domain Technologie Control bw_per_month.php information disclosure
CVE-2011-0435.body: Domain Technologie Control could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper checking of authentication by the admin/bw_per_month.php and client/bw_per_month.php scripts. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain bandwidth usage information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Domain Technologie Control GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-0437.title: Domain Technologie Control ssh.php security bypass
CVE-2011-0437.body: Domain Technologie Control could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper handling of access permissions by ssh.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to delete user accounts.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Domain Technologie Control GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-0438.title: nss-pam-ldapd PAM module security bypass
CVE-2011-0438.body: nss-pam-ldapd could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper returning of a success code by the PAM module. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and possibly gain unauthorized access to a root account.Upgrade to the latest version of nss-pam-ldapd (0.8.1 or later), available from the Arthur de Jong Web page. See References.

CVE-2011-0439.title: Mahara Pieform cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0439.body: Mahara is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Pieform select box options to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Mahara (1.2.7 or 1.3.4 or later), available from the Mahara Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0444.title: Wireshark MAC-LTE buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0444.body: Wireshark (formerly Ethereal) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the MAC-LTE dissector. By sending a specially-crafted packet, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to wnpa-sec-2011-01 or wnpa-sec-2011-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0445.title: Wireshark ASN.1 BER dissector denial of service
CVE-2011-0445.body: Wireshark (formerly Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an assertion error in the ASN.1 BER dissector. By sending a specially-crafted packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Refer to wnpa-sec-2011-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2011-0451.title: EC-CUBE list.tpl and cart_tag.tpl template file cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0451.body: EC-CUBE is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the list.tpl and cart_tag.tpl template file. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unknown parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of EC-CUBE, (2.4.4 or later), available from the EC-CUBE Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0454.title: SEIL routers PPP Access Concentrator buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0454.body: SEIL routers is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the PPP Access Concentrator (PPPAC). By sending specially-crafted PPPoE packets, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the device to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of SEIL (1.62 or 3.12 or 2.11 or later), available from the SEIL Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0455.title: Things CGI BBS and Things CGI BBS Thread unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0455.body: Things CGI BBS and Things CGI BBS Thread is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Things CGI BBS(2.0.3 or later), available from the Things CGI Web site. See References. Upgrade to the latest version of Things CGI BBS Thread (2.0.3 or later), available from the Things BBS Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0465.title: X.Org X11 xrdb utility command execution
CVE-2011-0465.body: X.Org X11 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of input by the Server Resource Database xrdb utility when the hostname is retrieved by the display manager. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary shell commands on the system with root privileges.Refer to X.Org security advisory, April 5th, 2011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0468.title: aaa_base filename privilege escalation
CVE-2011-0468.body: aaa_base could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper handling of filenames when performing tab expansions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using specially-crafted named files to execute arbitrary commands on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-0471.title: Google Chrome node iteration unspecified
CVE-2011-0471.body: An unspecified error in Google Chrome related to handling pointers within node iteration has an unknown impact and remote attack vector.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (8.0.552.237 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0476.title: Google Chrome PDF files code execution
CVE-2011-0476.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an out-of-memory condition when processing PDF files. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to corrupt the stack and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (8.0.552.237 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0477.title: Google Chrome video frame sizes code execution
CVE-2011-0477.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when handling mismatched video frame sizes. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to reference invalid memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (8.0.552.237 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0478.title: Google Chrome use code execution
CVE-2011-0478.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when handling SVG "<use>" elements. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to reference a stale pointer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (8.0.552.237 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0484.title: Google Chrome DOM node denial of service
CVE-2011-0484.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error related to the removal of a DOM node. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to cause a stale rendering node.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (8.0.552.237 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0485.title: Google Chrome speech code execution
CVE-2011-0485.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error related to related to speech handling. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (8.0.552.237 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0486.title: IBM Cognos 8 Business Intelligence pathinfo cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0486.body: IBM Cognos 8 Business Intelligence is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the cognos.cgi script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the pathinfo parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Cognos 8 Business Intelligence (8.4.1 FP1 or 8.4.1 FP2 or later), available from the IBM Support & download Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0487.title: ICQ updates code execution
CVE-2011-0487.body: ICQ could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the failure to verify the origin of automatic updates. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof update.icq.com and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of ICQ 7.4.4629, available from the ICQ Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0488.title: InduSoft Web Studio and Advantech Studio NTWebServer.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0488.body: InduSoft Web Studio and Advantech Studio are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the NTWebServer.exe. By sending an overly long request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.For Advantech Studio: Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Advantech Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0489.title: Objectivity/DB operations security bypass
CVE-2011-0489.body: Objectivity/DB could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by various administrative operations being performed by some components without having authentication. By sending commands to TCP ports 6779 and 6780, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information or shutdown the application server.Refer to Objectivity Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0492.title: Tor blobs denial of service
CVE-2011-0492.body: Tor is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an assertion failure. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using vectors related to blobs that trigger a certain file size to cause a daemon exit.Upgrade to the latest version of Tor (0.2.1.29 or later), available from the Tor Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0493.title: Tor router cache denial of service
CVE-2011-0493.body: Tor is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an assertion failure. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using vectors related to malformed router caches and improper handling of integer values to cause a daemon exit.Upgrade to the latest version of Tor (0.2.1.29 or later), available from the Tor Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0495.title: Asterisk ast_uri_encode() buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0495.body: Asterisk is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ast_uri_encode() function. If the SIP channel driver is configured with the pedantic option enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted caller ID information to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to AST-2011-001 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0497.title: Sybase EAServer unspecified file include
CVE-2011-0497.body: Sybase EAServer could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to an unspecified script using an unknown parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Sybase Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0499.title: VideoSpirit name buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0499.body: VideoSpirit is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing VideoSpirit project files (*.visprj). By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file containing a valitem element with a long "name" attribute, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-0505.title: Zwii system.php file include
CVE-2011-0505.body: Zwii could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled and register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the system.php script using the set[template][value] parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-0506.title: Ax Developer CMS user,php file include
CVE-2011-0506.body: Ax Developer CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the user.php script using the aXconf parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-0508.title: Contao X_FORWARDED_FOR cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0508.body: Contao is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when submitting a comment. CVE-2011-0509.title: Vaadin unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-0509.body: Vaadin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2011-0510.title: AWBS cart.php SQL injection
CVE-2011-0510.body: AWBS (Advanced Webhost Billing System) is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2011-0516.title: BetMore Site Suite bid SQL injection
CVE-2011-0516.body: BetMore Site Suite is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the mainx_a.php script using the bid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of BetMore (4.2.1 or later), available from the E-PROMPT C. Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0517.body: Winlog is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the TCP/IP server when processing protocol data. CVE-2011-0518.title: LotusCMS index.php file include
CVE-2011-0518.body: LotusCMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2011-0520.title: MaraDNS compress_add_dlabel_points() buffer overflow
CVE-2011-0520.body: MaraDNS is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the compress_add_dlabel_points() function.
