CVE-2011-1735.body: An unspecified vulnerability in HP OpenView Storage Data Protector could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to HPSBMA02668 SSRT100474 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1736.title: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector unspecified code execution
CVE-2011-1736.body: An unspecified vulnerability in HP OpenView Storage Data Protector could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to HPSBMA02668 SSRT100474 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1739.title: FreeBSD mountd security bypass
CVE-2011-1739.body: FreeBSD could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the incorrect computation of netmasks by the mountd daemon. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass ACL lists to allow client computers to mount to Network Filesystem (NFS) filesystems without having proper authentication.Refer to FreeBSD-SA-11:01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1740.title: EMC Avamar client data security bypass
CVE-2011-1740.body: EMC Avamar could allow a remote attacker with domain administrator privileges to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when enforcing domain restrictions during the client data restore. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to restore data to and from clients in another domain and to view restricted information within another domain.Refer to ESA-2011-018 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1750.title: QEMU KVM virtio-blk driver privilege escalation
CVE-2011-1750.body: QEMU KVM could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by buffer overflow errors in the virtio_blk_handle_write() and virtio_blk_handle_read() functions. By sending specially-crafted requests to the virtio-blk driver, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or gain elevated privileges on the system.Refer to QEMU GIT Repository for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1753.title: ejabberd XML denial of service
CVE-2011-1753.body: ejabberd is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing XML input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using heavily nested XML entities to consume an overly large amount of CPU resources.Upgrade to the latest version of ejabberd (2.1.7 or later), available from the ejabberd Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1754.title: jabberd14 XML denial of service
CVE-2011-1754.body: jabberd14 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing XML input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using heavily nested XML entities to consume an overly large amount of CPU resources.Refer to jabberd Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1755.title: jabberd XML entity denial of service
CVE-2011-1755.body: jabberd is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing XML input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using heavily nested XML entities to consume an overly large amount of CPU resources.Upgrade to the latest version of jabberd (2.2.14 or later), available from the jabberd project Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2011-1784.title: keepalived PID denial of service
CVE-2011-1784.body: keepalived is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the creation of PID files with insecure permissions. By manipulating the stored process ID, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause processes to terminate.Upgrade to the latest version of keepalived (1.2.3 or later), available from the keepalived Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1785.body: VMware ESX Server and ESXi are vulnerable to a denial of service, cause by an error when handling sockets. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to exahust all available sockets.Refer to VMSA-2011-0007 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1786.title: Likewise Open and Likewise Enterprise lsaad denial of service
CVE-2011-1786.body: Likewise Open and Likewise Enterprise is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an assertion error in the Likewise Security Authority (lsassd) service. By sending specially-crafted data, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to terminate.Refer to LWSA-2011-001 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-1788.title: VMware vCenter Server SOAP session ID information disclosure
CVE-2011-1788.body: VMware vCenter Server could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the insecure storing of a SOAP session ID by log files. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the admin ID and other sensitive information.Refer to VMSA-2011-0008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1808.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by use-after-free errors in float handling. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (12.0.742.91 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1809.title: Google Chrome accessibility support code execution
CVE-2011-1809.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by use-after-free errors in accessibility support. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (12.0.742.91 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1810.title: Google Chrome CSS information disclosure
CVE-2011-1810.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an information leak in CSS. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to disclose the history.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (12.0.742.91 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1813.title: Google Chrome extension framework code execution
CVE-2011-1813.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a stale pointer in extension framework. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (12.0.742.91 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1815.title: Google Chrome tab page cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-1815.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the tab page to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (12.0.742.91 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1817.title: Google Chrome history deletion code execution
CVE-2011-1817.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in history deletion. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (12.0.742.91 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1818.title: Google Chrome image loader code execution
CVE-2011-1818.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by use-after-free error within the image loader. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (12.0.742.91 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1865.title: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector buffer overflow
CVE-2011-1865.body: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By sending a request to TCP port 5555 containing specially-crafted parameters, including an opcode, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMU02686 SSRT100541 rev.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1866.title: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector inet service buffer overflow
CVE-2011-1866.body: HP OpenView Storage Data Protector is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by omniinet.exe in the inet service. By sending a specially-crafted request to TCP port 5555, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMU02686 SSRT100541 rev.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1867.title: HP Intelligent Management Center unspecified code execution
CVE-2011-1867.body: Multiple HP Intelligent Management Center products could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the iNOdeMngChecker.exe component. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM-level privileges.Refer to HPSB3C02687 SSRT100377 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1868.title: Microsoft Windows DFS code execution
CVE-2011-1868.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper validation of fields within malicious DFS responses by the Microsoft Distributed File System (DFS) implementation. By sending a specially-crafted DFS response to a client-initiated DFS request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS11-042. See References.

CVE-2011-1869.title: Microsoft Windows DFS denial of service
CVE-2011-1869.body: Microsoft Windows is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of DFS referral responses by the Microsoft Distributed File System (DFS) implementation. By sending a specially-crafted network message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to stop accepting requests and force a restart.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS11-042. See References.

CVE-2011-1873.title: Microsoft Windows Win32k OTF code execution
CVE-2011-1873.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper parsing of OTF fonts on 64-bit systems by the kernel-mode driver (Win32k.sys). By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2011-1889.title: Microsoft Forefront Threat Management Gateway TMG Firewall Client buffer overflow
CVE-2011-1889.body: Microsoft Forefront Threat Management Gateway 2010 Client is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the TMG Firewall Client. By sending specially-crafted requests on a system where the TMG firewall client is used, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS11-040. See References.

CVE-2011-1907.title: ISC BIND RRSIG denial of service
CVE-2011-1907.body: ISC BIND is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an assertion failure when handling RRSIG queries while the Response Policy Zones (RPZ) feature is enabled for RRset replacement. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using RRSIG queries to cause the server to terminate.Upgrade to the latest version of ISC BIND (9.8.0-P1 or later), available from the Internet Software Consortium (ISC) Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1911.title: JasperReports Server _flowExecutionKey parameter cross-site request forgery
CVE-2011-1911.body: JasperReports Server is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to _flowExecutionKey parameter to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-1913.title: Mercator Sentinel unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2011-1913.body: Mercator Sentinel is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-1921.title: Apache Subversion control rules information disclosure
CVE-2011-1921.body: Apache Subversion could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the mod_dav_svn module when handling path-based access control rules for files. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain read access to files and directories stored in the Subversion repository.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Subversion (1.6.17 or later), available from the Apache Subversion Web Site. See References.

CVE-2011-1922.title: Unbound DNS denial of service
CVE-2011-1922.body: Unbound is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of specific DNS queries. By sending a specially-crafted DNS query, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to trigger an assertion error and crash the server.Upgrade to the latest version of Unbound (1.4.10 or later), available from the Unbound Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1926.title: Cyrus IMAP Server STARTTLS command execution
CVE-2011-1926.body: Cyrus IMAP Server could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands, caused by the STARTTLS implementation improperly restricting I/O buffering. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via man-in-the-middle techniques to inject commands into encrypted sessions.Upgrade to the latest version of Cyrus IMAP (2.4.7 or later), available from the Cyrus IMAP Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1929.title: Dovecot header name denial of service
CVE-2011-1929.body: Dovecot is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing header names containing NULL characters. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Dovecot (2.0.13 or later), available from the Dovecot Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1938.title: PHP socket_connect() buffer overflow
CVE-2011-1938.body: PHP is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the socket_connect() function. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the PHP SVN Repository. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-1943.title: NetworkManager destroy_one_secret information disclosure
CVE-2011-1943.body: NetworkManager could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the destroy_one_secret function in the in the libnm-util library. By reading a log file, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-1946.title: libgnomesu PAM backend setuid() privilege escalation
CVE-2011-1946.body: libgnomesu could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error related to the gnomesu-pam-backend suid pam binary failing to check return value of setuid() calls. An attacker with guest, cgi, or web privileges could exploit this vulnerability to run arbitrary commands as root.Refer to Novell Bugzilla ID 695627 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1947.title: Fetchmail STARTTLS denial of service
CVE-2011-1947.body: Fetchmail is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of SSL/TLS negotiation. By sending a specially-crafted STARTTLS request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to hang.Refer to fetchmail-SA-2011-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1948.title: Plone unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-1948.body: Plone is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (hotfix 20110531), available from the Plone Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1949.title: Plone Portal.PortalTransforms cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-1949.body: Plone is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a markup to Portal.PortalTransforms to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (hotfix 20110531), available from the Plone Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1950.title: Plone data security bypass
CVE-2011-1950.body: Plone could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper checking for authorization by plone.app.user. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform unauthorized data changes.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (hotfix 20110531), available from the Plone Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-1957.title: Wireshark DICOM denial of service
CVE-2011-1957.body: Wireshark (formerly Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the DICOM dissector. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Capture file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to enter into an infinite loop.Refer to wnpa-sec-2011-07 or wnpa-sec-2011-08 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1959.title: Wireshark snoop denial of service
CVE-2011-1959.body: Wireshark (formerly Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a stack-based buffer overflow when processing a snoop file. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Capture file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the application to crash.Refer to wnpa-sec-2011-07 or wnpa-sec-2011-08 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2020.title: TIBCO iProcess Suite unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2020.body: TIBCO iProcess Suite is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to TIBCO Software Inc. Security Advisory May 18, 2011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2040.title: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client helper application code execution
CVE-2011-2040.body: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of the authenticity of the downloaded Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client executable when the client is deployed from the VPN headend. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to cisco-sa-20110601-ac for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2064.title: Cisco Content Services Gateway ICMP denial of service
CVE-2011-2064.body: Cisco Content Services Gateway is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending a specially-crafted ICMP packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20110706-csg for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2080.title: MediaCAST managetraining SQL injection
CVE-2011-2080.body: MediaCAST is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to managetraining using the CP_ENLARGESTYLE cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of MediaCAST, available from the Inventive Technology Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2080.title: MediaCAST authenticate_ad_setup_finished.cfm SQL injection
CVE-2011-2080.body: MediaCAST is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the CP_ENLARGESTYLE cookie to the default URI or the authenticate_ad_setup_finished.cfm script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of MediaCAST, available from the Inventive Technology Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2089.title: ICONICS WebHMI ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2089.body: The ICONICS WebHMI ActiveX control (GenVersion.dl) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string argument to the insecure SetActiveXGUID method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of ICONICS WebHMI (9.22 or later), available from the ICONICS Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2093.title: LiveCycle Data Services and BlazeDS graph object denial of service
CVE-2011-2093.body: LiveCycle Data Services and BlazeDS are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing specific graph objects. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Refer to APSB11-15 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2096.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2096.body: Adobe Reader and Acrobat are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB11-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2098.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat code execution
CVE-2011-2098.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat could allow a remote attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system using unknown attack vectors.Refer to APSB11-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2099.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat code execution
CVE-2011-2099.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat could allow a remote attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system using unknown attack vectors.Refer to APSB11-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2101.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat cross-domain code execution
CVE-2011-2101.body: Adobe Reader and Acrobat could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass cross-domain security restrictions to execute arbitrary code on the system or obtain sensitive information from another domain.Refer to APSB11-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2103.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat code execution
CVE-2011-2103.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat could allow a remote attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system using unknown attack vectors.Refer to APSB11-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2104.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat denial of service
CVE-2011-2104.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat could allow a remote attacker to corrupt memory and cause the application to crash using unknown attack vectors.Refer to APSB11-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2105.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat code execution
CVE-2011-2105.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat could allow a remote attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system using unknown attack vectors.Refer to APSB11-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2106.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat code execution
CVE-2011-2106.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat could allow a remote attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system using unknown attack vectors.Refer to APSB11-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2107.title: Adobe Flash Player unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2107.body: Adobe Flash Player, as bundled in multiple products, is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to APSB11-13 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2110.title: Adobe Flash Player ActionScript3 code execution
CVE-2011-2110.body: Adobe Flash Player, as bundled in multiple products, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an array indexing error in the ActionScript3 AVM2 verification logic. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB11-18 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2125.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Dirapix.dll buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2125.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Dirapix.dll component when processing malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Shockwave file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB11-17 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2126.title: Adobe Shockwave Player unspecified buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2126.body: Adobe Shockwave Player is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Shockwave file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB11-17 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2128.title: Adobe Shockwave Player memory code execution
CVE-2011-2128.body: Adobe Shockwave Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Shockwave file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB11-17 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2141.title: IBM Datacap Taskmaster Capture TMWeb component SQL injection
CVE-2011-2141.body: IBM Datacap Taskmaster Capture is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the TMWeb component, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to IBM Support and Downloads for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2142.title: IBM Datacap Taskmaster Capture Web Client Service unspecified
CVE-2011-2142.body: An unspecified error in IBM Datacap Taskmaster Capture related to the Web Client Service requiring a password has an unknown impact and attack vector.Refer to IBM Support and Downloads for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2143.title: IBM Datacap Taskmaster Capture password information disclosure
CVE-2011-2143.body: IBM Datacap Taskmaster Capture could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. If Windows Authentication is enabled, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an incorrect password in conjunction with an account name from a different domain to obtain login access.Refer to IBM Support and Downloads for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2144.title: IBM Datacap Taskmaster Capture eDocument Conversion Actions denial of service
CVE-2011-2144.body: IBM Datacap Taskmaster Capture is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the eDocument Conversion Actions implementation. By sending an overly long subject line in an e-mail message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Refer to IBM Support and Downloads for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2145.title: Multiple VMware products mount.vmhgfs utility privilege escalation
CVE-2011-2145.body: Multiple VMware products could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a procedural error in the mount.vmhgfs utility. An attacker with access to the Guest filesystem could exploit this vulnerability to gain write access to arbitrary files and elevated privileges on the system.Refer to VMSA-2011-0009 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2147.title: Openswan starter.pid denial of service
CVE-2011-2147.body: Openswan is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper restrictions for starter.pid and var/lock/subsys/ipsec. By writing arbitrary data to a file, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to kill arbitrary processes.No remedy available as of June 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-2148.title: SmarterTools SmarterStats frmSite.aspx command execution
CVE-2011-2148.body: SmarterTools SmarterStats could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error in the frmSite.aspx script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using attack vectors related to special characters to execute arbitrary commands on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of SmarterStats (6.2 or later), available from the SmarterTools Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2149.title: SmarterTools SmarterStats multiple SQL injection
CVE-2011-2149.body: SmarterTools SmarterStats is vulnerable to multiple SQL injections. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to multiple scripts using various parameters, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands on the system or to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of SmarterStats (6.2 or later), available from the SmarterTools Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2179.title: Icinga expand cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2179.body: Icinga is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the config.cgi script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the expand parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Icinga (1.4.1 or later), available from the Icinga Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2188.title: LuaExpat XML denial of service
CVE-2011-2188.body: LuaExpat is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing XML input. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted XML file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the vulnerable XML parsing library to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of LuaExpat (1.2 or later), available from the Lua Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2193.title: TORQUE Resource Manager hostnames buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2193.body: TORQUE Resource Manager is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by get_hostaddr.c when processing host names. By sending an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of TORQUE Resource Manager (2.4.14 or later), available from the Cluster Resources Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2193.title: TORQUE Resource Manager privilege escalation
CVE-2011-2193.body: TORQUE Resource Manager could allow a remote and local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by multiple buffer overflows in the qsub command and pbs_iff. By sending an overly long input to the Job_Name field and host variable, an authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of TORQUE Resource Manager (2.4.14 or later), available from the Cluster Resources Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2202.title: PHP SAPI_POST_HANDLER_FUNC() security bypass
CVE-2011-2202.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the SAPI_POST_HANDLER_FUNC() in rfc1867.c when handling files. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a multipart/form-data POST request to append a special character to the filename and delete files from the root directory.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the PHP SVN Repository. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2205.title: Prosody XML denial of service
CVE-2011-2205.body: Prosody is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing XML input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using heavily nested XML entities to consume an overly large amount of CPU resources.Upgrade to the latest version of Prosody (0.8.1 or later), available from the Prosody Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2217.title: Multiple VMware products VI Client ActiveX controls code execution
CVE-2011-2217.body: Multiple VMware products could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error in VI Client ActiveX controls. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Refer to VMSA-2011-0009 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2226.title: Kiwi pattern listing cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2226.body: Kiwi is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by when displaying pattern listing. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2328.title: HP LoadRunner Virtual User buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2328.body: HP LoadRunner is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing Virtual User script files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .usr file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of HP LoadRunner (11.00 patch 4 or later), available from the HP Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2329.body: Apache Rampart/C could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper calculation of the expiration of timestamp tokens by the rampart_timestamp_token_validate function. By leveraging an expired token, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to gain unauthorized access to the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2330.title: IBM Tivoli Management Framework Tivoli Endpoint code execution
CVE-2011-2330.body: IBM Tivoli Management Framework could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a "trivially" accessed built-in-account within Tivoli Endpoint. By sending a specially-crafted request to restricted pages via TCP port 9495, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause a denial of service.Refer to IBM Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2331.title: Intelligent Management Center (IMC) img.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2331.body: Intelligent Management Center (IMC) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the img.exe binary. By sending a specially-crafted request to TCP port 8800, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-2332.title: Google Chrome v8 security bypass
CVE-2011-2332.body: Google Chrome Frame could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by an error within v8. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions to gain unauthorized access to other domains and obtain sensitive information from the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (12.0.742.91 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2342.title: Google Chrome DOM security bypass
CVE-2011-2342.body: Google Chrome Frame could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by an error within DOM. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions to gain unauthorized access to other domains and obtain sensitive information from the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (12.0.742.91 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2352.title: Apple iTunes WebKit code execution
CVE-2011-2352.body: Apple iTunes could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an memory corruption error in WebKit. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious iTunes Store via iTunes, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iTunes (10.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2354.title: Apple iTunes unspecified code execution
CVE-2011-2354.body: Apple iTunes could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an memory corruption error in WebKit. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious iTunes Store via iTunes, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iTunes (10.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2356.title: Apple iTunes AddressSanitizer code execution
CVE-2011-2356.body: Apple iTunes could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an memory corruption error in WebKit when using the AddressSanitizer. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious iTunes Store via iTunes, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iTunes (10.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2358.title: Google Chrome browser dialog code execution
CVE-2011-2358.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error related to an extension install via a browser dialog. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (13.0.782.107 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2359.title: Google Chrome bad line code execution
CVE-2011-2359.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a bad line box tracking in rendering. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (13.0.782.107 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2361.title: Google Chrome auth dialog weak security
CVE-2011-2361.body: Google Chrome could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error related to the designation of strings in the basic auth dialog. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (13.0.782.107 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2373.title: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey and Thunderbird XUL code execution
CVE-2011-2373.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey and Thunderbird could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error when handling XUL documents. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted XUL document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the browser to crash.Refer to MFSA 2011-20 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2379.title: Bugzilla patch attachments cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2379.body: Bugzilla is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input prior to being viewed in Raw Unified mode. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using patch attachments to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Internet Explorer or Safari browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Bugzilla (3.4.12, 3.6.6, or 4.1.3 or later), available from the Bugzilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2380.title: Bugzilla editing information disclosure
CVE-2011-2380.body: Bugzilla could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when handling specific URLs when editing a bug. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain a group name.Upgrade to the latest version of Bugzilla (3.4.12, 3.6.6, or 4.1.3 or later), available from the Bugzilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2381.title: Bugzilla attachment descriptions header injection
CVE-2011-2381.body: Bugzilla is vulnerable to header injection, caused by improper validation of input when processing attachment descriptions. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject email headers when a flagmail notification is sent, which will allow the attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking.Upgrade to the latest version of Bugzilla (3.4.12, 3.6.6, or 4.1.3 or later), available from the Bugzilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2385.title: iPhoneHandle package for OTRS privilege escalation
CVE-2011-2385.body: The iPhoneHandle package for OTRS could allow a remote authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system to read and modify OTRS core objects.Refer to OSA-2011-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2397.title: Iron Mountain Connected Backup command execution
CVE-2011-2397.body: Iron Mountain Connected Backup could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of input by the Agent service. By sending a specially-crafted request containing opcode 13 to TCP port 16833, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the agent process with the privileges of the victim.Refer to Iron Mountain Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2400.title: HP SiteScope unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2400.body: HP SiteScope is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to HPSBMU02692 SSRT100581 rev.2 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2402.title: HP Network Automation unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2402.body: HP Network Automation is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to HPSBMU02693 SSRT100583 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2423.title: Adobe Shockwave Player msvcr90.dll code execution
CVE-2011-2423.body: Adobe Shockwave Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of input by the msvcr90.dll component when processing malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Shockwave file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.efer to APSB11-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2467.title: Likewise Open and Likewise Enterprise lsassd service SQL injection
CVE-2011-2467.body: Likewise Open and Likewise Enterprise is vulnerable to SQL injection. A local attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to lsassd service, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to Likewise Security Advisory LWSA-2011-002 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2471.title: OProfile opcontrol privilege escalation
CVE-2011-2471.body: OProfile could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in opcontrol. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using shell metacharacters in the --vmlinux, --session-dir or --xen argument to gain elevated privileges on the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2472.title: OProfile opcontrol directory traversal
CVE-2011-2472.body: OProfile could allow a local attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to opcontrol containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the --save argument to overwrite arbitrary files on the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2476.title: Coppermine Photo Gallery unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2476.body: Coppermine Photo Gallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Coppermine Photo Gallery 1.5.12 available from the Coppermine Photo Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2477.title: Icinga config.cgi cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2477.body: Icinga is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the config.cgi script. If escape_html_tags is disabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a JavaScript expression to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Icinga (1.4.1 or later), available from the Icinga Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2483.title: PHP crypt_blowfish information disclosure
CVE-2011-2483.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper handling of passwords with 8-bit characters by crypt_blowfish function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the MD5 password hash and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.3.7 or later), available from The PHP Group Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2484.title: Linux Kernel taskstats.c denial of service
CVE-2011-2484.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the NETLINK taskstats.c interface. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to exhaust all available kernel memory and crash the kernel.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2501.title: libpng pngerror.c denial of service
CVE-2011-2501.body: libpng is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an off-by-one error in pngerror.c. By persuading a victim to view a specially-crafted PNG image file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the libpng GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-2510.title: DokuWiki rss cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2510.body: DokuWiki is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when adding a RSS link. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a rss tag to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of DokuWiki (2011-05-25a or later), available from the DokuWiki Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2511.title: libvirt VirDomainGetVcpus() buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2511.body: libvirt is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the VirDomainGetVcpus() function. By sending an overly long request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the libvirtd daemon to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of libvirt (0.9.3 or later), available from the libvirt Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2516.title: Apache XML Security denial of service
CVE-2011-2516.body: Apache XML Security is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when verifying XML signatures of files signed with RSA, DSA, or ECDSA keys. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using overly long keys to cause the application to crash. Note: This vulnerability also affects Shibboleth.Upgrade to the latest version of XML Security (1.6.1 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2520.title: Red Hat system-config-firewall privilege escalation
CVE-2011-2520.body: Red Hat system-config-firewall could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the Python pickle module. By sending a specially-crafted D-Bus message, an attacker with privileges to configure firewall rules could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary shellcode on the system with root privileges.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2522.title: Samba SWAT cross-site request forgery
CVE-2011-2522.body: Samba is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by Samba Web Administration Tool (SWAT). By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to shutdown or start Samba daemons and add or remove user accounts. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Samba (3.5.10 or later), available from the Samba Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2526.title: Apache Tomcat sendfile information disclosure
CVE-2011-2526.body: Apache Tomcat could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper validation of request attributes by sendfile. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information and cause the JVM to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Tomcat (7.0.19, 6.0.33, or 5.5.34 or later), available from the Apache Tomcat Web Site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2529.title: Asterisk sipsock_read() denial of service
CVE-2011-2529.body: Asterisk is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper validation of input by the sipsock_read() function. By sending a specially-crafted SIP packet containing a NULL byte, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and cause the application to crash.Refer to AST-2011-008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2543.title: Cisco TelePresence Endpoint getXML buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2543.body: Cisco TelePresence Endpoint is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by getXML. By sending an overly long string argument, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of TelePresence Endpoint (TC4.2 or later), available from the Cisco Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2544.title: Cisco TelePresence Endpoint H.323 or SIP cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2544.body: Cisco TelePresence Endpoint is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the H.323 ID or SIP Display Name fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of TelePresence Endpoint (TC4.2 or later), available from the Cisco Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2546.title: Cisco SA 500 Series Security Appliances login form SQL injection
CVE-2011-2546.body: Cisco SA 500 Series Security Appliances are vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login form, which could allow the attacker to obtain usernames and passwords.Refer to cisco-sa-20110720-sa500 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2547.body: Cisco SA 500 Series Security Appliances could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of input by the web management interface. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary commands on the system.Refer to cisco-sa-20110720-sa500 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2578.title: Cisco IOS SIP NAT denial of service
CVE-2011-2578.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory leak error. By sending a specially-crafted SIP packets on a NAT interface, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available memory resources.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-2583.title: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express network traffic denial of service
CVE-2011-2583.body: Cisco Unified Contact Center Express (aka CCX) is vulnerable to a denial of service. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using network traffic to cause a denial of service.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-2584.title: Cisco Show and Share administration pages security bypass
CVE-2011-2584.body: Cisco Show and Share could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to several administrative Web pages without having prior user authentication.Refer to cisco-sa-20111019-sns for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2587.title: VLC Media Player RM buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2587.body: VLC Media Player is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error when parsing a RealAudio data block. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted RealMedia (RM) file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to VideoLAN-SA-1105 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2588.title: VLC Media Player strf chunk buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2588.body: VLC Media Player is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error when parsing the strf chunk. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted AVI file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to VideoLAN-SA-1106 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2589.title: UUSee ActiveX control SendLogAction() buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2589.body: The UUSee ActiveX control (UUPlayer.ocx) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string argument to the insecure SendLogAction() method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-2590.title: UUSee ActiveX control Play() code execution
CVE-2011-2590.body: The UUSee ActiveX control (UUPlayer.ocx) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper validation of input. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string argument to the insecure Play() method using the MPlayerPath parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-2592.title: Citrix Access Gateway Plug-in for Windows ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2592.body: The Citrix Access Gateway Plug-in for Windows nsepacom ActiveX control (nsepa.exe) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long "CSEC" HTTP response header to the insecure StartEpa() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-2593.title: Citrix Access Gateway Plug-in for Windows ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2593.body: The Citrix Access Gateway Plug-in for Windows nsepacom ActiveX control (nsepa.exe) is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow error. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes a specially-crafted Content-Length HTTP response header to the insecure StartEpa() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-2594.title: KMPlayer Title buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2594.body: KMPlayer is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing the Title entry within playlist files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted playlist file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-2595.title: ACDSee FotoSlate PLP buffer overflow
CVE-2011-2595.body: ACDSee FotoSlate is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing the id parameter within a malicious PLP file. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted FotoSlate Project (PLP) file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-2606.title: IBM Rational Team Concert unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2606.body: IBM Rational Team Concert is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM APAR PM40308 or PM40311 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2607.title: IBM Rational Team Concert unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2607.body: IBM Rational Team Concert is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM APAR PM40308 or PM40311 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2608.body: HP Operations Manager could allow a remote attacker delete arbitrary files from the system, caused by the deletion of specified files in a Register request by the OV Communications Broker service (ovbbccb.exe). By sending a specially-crafted Register request to TCP port 383, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to delete arbitrary files from the system.Refer to HPSBMU02691 SSRT100483 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2609.title: Opera Data URIs cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2609.body: Opera is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by Data URIs. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (11.50 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2640.title: Opera empty parameter denial of service
CVE-2011-2640.body: Opera is vulnerable to a denial of service. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an HTML document that has an empty parameter value for an embedded Java applet to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (11.10 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2642.title: phpMyAdmin table print view script cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2642.body: phpMyAdmin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the table print view script. If a table name exists, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to PMASA-2011-9 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2643.title: phpMyAdmin MIME-type file include
CVE-2011-2643.body: phpMyAdmin could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If the configuration storage mechanism is configured, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request using the MIME-type transformation parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Refer to PMASA-2011-10 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2644.title: Kiwi RPM cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-2644.body: Kiwi is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when displaying RPM info. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2649.title: Kiwi FileUtils command execution
CVE-2011-2649.body: Kiwi could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an unwanted shell expansion when executing commands in FileUtils fix. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3140.title: HTTP parameter abuse detected
CVE-2011-3140.body: Various HTTP application technologies process query-strings (RFC 3986) in differing manners allowing for various injection attempts to be obfuscated. There is no standard of application behavior that dictates how a number of query-string parameters are to be processed. Therefore, an HTTP Parameter Polution injection attempt against a PHP server generally does not succeed against a different web application technology, such as ASP/ASPX, or Python. With thanks to Gary O'Leary-Steele of Sec-1 Ltd. and Wendel Guglielmetti Henrique of Trustwave's SpiderLabs.Block the offending traffic.
