By persuading a victim to visit a malicious iTunes Store via iTunes, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iTunes (10.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3241.body: Apple iTunes could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an memory corruption error in WebKit. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious iTunes Store via iTunes, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iTunes (10.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3242.title: Apple Safari Private Browsing security bypass
CVE-2011-3242.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a logic error when handling cookies while in Private Browsing mode. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to set cookies although the "Block cookies" option is enabled.Upgrade to the latest version of Safari (5.1.1 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3243.title: WebKit DOM windows cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3243.body: WebKit could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions and conduct cross-site scripting attacks, caused by an error when handling inactive DOM windows. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions and execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to APPLE-SA-2011-10-12-1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3244.title: Apple iTunes WebKit memory code execution
CVE-2011-3244.body: Apple iTunes could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an memory corruption error in WebKit. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious iTunes Store via iTunes, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iTunes (10.5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3246.title: Apple iOS HTTP cookies security bypass
CVE-2011-3246.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by the failure to restrict access to HTTP cookies by the CFNetwork component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions to gain unauthorized access to the cookies of other domains and obtain sensitive information from the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3256.title: Apple iOS FreeType code execution
CVE-2011-3256.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of FreeType fonts by the CoreGraphics component. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted document containing a malicious FreeType font, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3257.title: Apple iOS Data Access information disclosure
CVE-2011-3257.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the Data Access component when handling multiple mail exchange accounts configured and connected on the same server. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain session cookies from a different account.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3259.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV TCP denial of service
CVE-2011-3259.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the failure to reclaim memory from incomplete TCP connections. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to reset the device and exhaust all available system resources.For Apple iOS: Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For Apple TV: Upgrade to the latest version of Apple TV (4.4 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3260.title: Apple iOS OfficeImport buffer overflow
CVE-2011-3260.body: Apple iOS is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the OfficeImport component when handling malicious Microsoft Word documents. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Word file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3261.title: Apple iOS OfficeImport code execution
CVE-2011-3261.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a double free memory error within the OfficeImport component. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Excel file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3262.title: Xen xc_dom_bzimageloader.c denial of service
CVE-2011-3262.body: Xen is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the xc_dom_bzimageloader.c. By using unknown attack vectors, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to enter into an infinite loop.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the XenSource Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3263.title: Zabbix zabbix_agentd vfs.file.cksum denial of service
CVE-2011-3263.body: Zabbix is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in zabbix_agentd. By executing the vfs.file.cksum command for a special device, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available CPU resources.Upgrade to the latest version of Zabbix (1.8.6 or 1.9.4 or later), available from the Zabbix Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3264.title: Zabbix popup.php path disclosure
CVE-2011-3264.body: Zabbix could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the popup.php script using an invalid srcfld2 parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of Zabbix (1.8.6 or later), available from the Zabbix Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3265.title: Zabbix popup.php path disclosure
CVE-2011-3265.body: Zabbix could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the popup.php dcript using an invalid srctbl parameter to cause an error message to be returned containing the full installation path. An attacker could use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.Upgrade to the latest version of Zabbix (1.8.7 or later), available from the Zabbix Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3266.title: Wireshark proto_tree_add_item denial of service
CVE-2011-3266.body: Wireshark (formerly Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the proto_tree_add_item function when the IKEv1 protocol dissector is used. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using attack vectors involving a malformed IKE packet and many items in a tree to cause the application to enter into an infinite loop.Refer to wnpa-sec-2011-13 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3267.title: PHP error_log denial of service
CVE-2011-3267.body: PHP is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper implementation of the error_log function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.3.7 or later), available from The PHP Group Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3268.title: PHP crypt function buffer overflow
CVE-2011-3268.body: PHP is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the crypt function. By sending an overly long salt argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP (5.3.7 or later), available from The PHP Group Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3283.title: Cisco Carrier Routing System GRE denial of service
CVE-2011-3283.body: Cisco Carrier Routing System is vulnerable to a denial of service. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a fragmented GRE packet to cause the Metro subsystem to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3285.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances logon.html HTTP response splitting
CVE-2011-3285.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances (ASA) is vulnerable to HTTP response splitting attacks, caused by a CRLF injection error in the /+CSCOE+/logon.html. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and cause the server to return a split response using unknown attack vectors. This would allow the attacker to perform further attacks, such as Web cache poisoning or cross-site scripting, and possibly obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3294.title: Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server User-Agent cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3294.body: Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server (VCS) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the User-Agent header to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Cisco Security Response Document ID: 113264 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3296.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module syslog denial of service
CVE-2011-3296.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) for Cisco Catalyst switches is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the implementation of one specific system log message. If Cisco FWSM has interfaces with IPv6 addresses, a remote attacker could send Syslog message 302015 to cause the device to crash and force a reboot.Refer to cisco-sa-20111005-fwsm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3297.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module authentication proxy denial of service
CVE-2011-3297.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error related to the authentication proxy feature. By sending an overly large amount of network access authentication requests, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20111005-fwsm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3299.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module SunRPC inspection engine denial of service
CVE-2011-3299.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SunRPC inspection engine. If SunRPC inspection is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted SunRPC message to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20111005-fwsm or cisco-sa-20111005-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3300.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module SunRPC denial of service
CVE-2011-3300.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SunRPC inspection engine. If SunRPC inspection is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted SunRPC message to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20111005-fwsm or cisco-sa-20111005-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3301.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module SunRPC denial of service
CVE-2011-3301.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SunRPC inspection engine. If SunRPC inspection is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted SunRPC message to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20111005-fwsm or cisco-sa-20111005-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3302.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module SunRPC denial of service
CVE-2011-3302.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SunRPC inspection engine. If SunRPC inspection is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted SunRPC message to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20111005-fwsm or cisco-sa-20111005-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3303.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module ILS denial of service
CVE-2011-3303.body: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the ILS inspection engine. If ILS inspection is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted ILS message to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20111005-fwsm or cisco-sa-20111005-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3304.title: Cisco ASA 5500 Series Adaptive Security Appliances MSN IM denial of service
CVE-2011-3304.body: Cisco ASA 5500 Series Adaptive Security Appliances are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the MSN IM inspection feature. If the IM inspect engine is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20111005-asa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3305.title: Cisco Network Admission Control directory traversal
CVE-2011-3305.body: Cisco Network Admission Control (NAC) could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to TCP port 443 containing directory traversal sequences to obtain password files, system logs and other sensitive information.Refer to cisco-sa-20111005-nac for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3321.title: Siemens Simatic WinCC runtime loader buffer overflow
CVE-2011-3321.body: Siemens Simatic WinCC is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by runtime loader when parsing received packets. By sending specially-crafted packets to TCP port 2308, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3332.title: Iceni Argus .pdf file buffer overflow
CVE-2011-3332.body: Iceni Argus is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By persuading a victim to open a specially crafted .pdf file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3339.title: SafeNet Sentinel HASP unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3339.body: SafeNet Sentinel HASP is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of SafeNet Sentinel HASP SDK 5.11 and Run-time 6.21, available from the SafeNet Sentinel HASP Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3345.title: OpenFabrics Enterprise Distribution /proc/net/sdpstats denial of service
CVE-2011-3345.body: OpenFabrics Enterprise Distribution (OFED) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the implementation of the /proc/net/sdpstats proc file. By reading the /proc/net/sdpstats file, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenFabrics Enterprise Distribution (1.5.3 or later), available from the OpenFabrics Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3348.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_proxy_ajp denial of service
CVE-2011-3348.body: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in mod_proxy_ajp when used together with mod_proxy_balancer. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache HTTP Server (2.2.21 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3354.title: Quassel IRC CtcpParser::packedReply() denial of service
CVE-2011-3354.body: Quassel IRC is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the CtcpParser::packedReply() function. By sending multiple Client-To-Client Protocol (CTCP) messages, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the central core process and disrupt the IRC service.Refer to Quassel GIT Repository for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3356.title: MantisBT unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3356.body: MantisBT is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-3357.title: MantisBT action file include
CVE-2011-3357.body: MantisBT could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the bug_actiongroup_ext_page.php and bug_actiongroup_page.php scripts using the action parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-3358.title: MantisBT bug_report_page.php and bug_update_advanced_page.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3358.body: MantisBT is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the bug_report_page.php and bug_update_advanced_page.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the os, os_build or platform parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-3361.title: BackupPC num parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3361.body: BackupPC is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.cgi script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the num parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for you system. See References.

CVE-2011-3368.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_proxy information disclosure
CVE-2011-3368.body: Apache HTTP Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in mod_proxy when configured in reverse proxy mode and using the RewriteRule or ProxyPassMatch directives with a pattern match. By sending specially-crafted requests, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to internal servers to obtain sensitive information.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Apache Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3387.title: IBM Java class file denial of service
CVE-2011-3387.body: IBM Java is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when loading an invalid class file. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted attribute length field in a class file to cause the application to enter into an infinite loop.Refer to IBM APAR PM42551 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3388.title: Opera content information disclosure
CVE-2011-3388.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when loading content. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to display restricted information from a trusted Web site.Upgrade to the latest version of Opera (11.51 or later), available from the Opera Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3390.title: IBM Open Admin Tool index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3390.body: IBM Open Admin Tool is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the informixserver, host or port parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Open Admin Tool (2.72 or later), available from the IBM Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3391.title: IBM Rational Build Forge EditSecurity information disclosure
CVE-2011-3391.body: IBM Rational Build Forge could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to check the EditSecurity permissions when performing specific actions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to export a key file and obtain sensitive information.Refer to IBM APAR PM38058 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3392.title: Phorum control.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3392.body: Phorum is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the control.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the real_name parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Phorum (5.2.17 or later), available from the Phorum Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3422.title: Apple Mac OS X keychain certificate security bypass
CVE-2011-3422.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the Certificate Trust Policy. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass KeyChain security settings to accept an Extended Validation certificate as valid and launch further attacks on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple Mac OS X (10.7.3 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3423.title: Muliple TIBCO Managed File Transfer products unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3423.body: Muliple TIBCO Managed File Transfer products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to TIBCO Security Advisory Sep 13, 2011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3426.title: Apple iOS attachment cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3426.body: Apple iOS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by Safari. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "attachment" value for the HTTP Content-Disposition header to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3427.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV X.509 spoofing
CVE-2011-3427.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the acceptance of X.509 certificates with MD5 hashes. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted server certificate, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to cause the victim to accept an invalid certificate as valid and redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted.For Apple iOS: Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For Apple TV: Upgrade to the latest version of Apple TV (4.4 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3431.title: Apple iOS switching information disclosure
CVE-2011-3431.body: Apple iOS could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when switching between applications using the four-finger app switching gesture. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to display the previous application state and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3432.title: Apple iOS UIKit denial of service
CVE-2011-3432.body: Apple iOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of "tel:" URIs by the UIKit component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to hang.Upgrade to the latest version of Apple iOS (5 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3436.title: Apple Mac OS X Open Directory security bypass
CVE-2011-3436.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the Open Directory component within the access control mechanism. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify another user's password.Apply Apple Security Update 2011-006 or upgrade to the latest version of OS X Lion (10.7.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3437.title: Apple Mac OS X Type 1 code execution
CVE-2011-3437.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a signedness error in the ATS component when handling Type 1 fonts. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted document containing a malicious embedded font, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2011-006 or upgrade to the latest version of OS X Lion (10.7.2 or later), available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3486.title: TwinCAT datagram denial of service
CVE-2011-3486.body: TwinCAT is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the TwinCAT System Service (TCATSysSrv.exe) when processing certain datagrams. By sending specially-crafted datagrams to UDP port 48899, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.TwinCAT customer should contact Beckhoff support at patch@beckhoff.com for patch information.

CVE-2011-3487.title: PlantVisor Enhanced unspecified directory traversal
CVE-2011-3487.body: PlantVisor Enhanced could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing URL-encoded "dot dot" sequences (..%5C ..%5C, ..%2f..%2f) to traverse directories and read arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3489.title: Rockwell RSLogix rna denial of service
CVE-2011-3489.body: Rockwell RSLogix is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in RnaUtility.dll. By sending specially-crafted rna packets to TCP port 4446, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Refer to Rockwell Automation Security Advisory KB 456144 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3491.title: Progea Movicon Content-Length buffer overflow
CVE-2011-3491.body: Progea Movicon is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling the Content-Length header. By sending a specially-crafted request to TCP port 808, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (HotFix_Movicon11.2.1085.4.zip), available from the Progea Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3492.title: DAQFactory NETB buffer overflow
CVE-2011-3492.body: DAQFactory is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking when logging client details for received NETB datagrams. By sending an overly large NETB datagram to UDP port 20034, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of DAQFactory (5.86 or later), available from the AzeoTech Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3499.title: Progea Movicon EIDP denial of service
CVE-2011-3499.body: Progea Movicon is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when handling web requests containing certain EIDP content. By sending a specially-crafted request to TCP port 808, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (HotFix_Movicon11.2.1085.4.zip), available from the Progea Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3575.title: IBM Lotus Domino HPRAgentName buffer overflow
CVE-2011-3575.body: IBM Lotus Domino is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the WebAdmin.nsf module. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, a remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to IBM Notes/Domino Fix List for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3577.title: IBM WebSphere Commerce Activity Token unspecified
CVE-2011-3577.body: An unspecified error in IBM WebSphere Commerce related to the Activity Token has an unknown impact and remote attack vector.Refer to IBM APAR JR40420 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3579.title: IceWarp Web Mail XML information disclosure
CVE-2011-3579.body: IceWarp Web Mail could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the XML external entity. By injecting an XML DOCTYPE "SYSTEM" directive, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to local files and obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of IceWarp Web Mail (10.3.3 or later), available from the IceWarp Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3580.title: IceWarp Web Mail phpinfo() information disclosure
CVE-2011-3580.body: IceWarp Web Mail could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. A remote attacker could send a direct request to the phpinfo.php script, which invokes the phpinfo() function to return sensitive information about the system. An attacker could then use this information to launch further attacks against the affected application.Upgrade to the latest version of IceWarp Web Mail (10.3.3 or later), available from the IceWarp Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3615.title: Simple Machines Forum HTML entities SQL injection
CVE-2011-3615.body: Simple Machines Forum is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using vectors related to HTML entity or display name, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Simple Machines Forum 2.0.1 or 1.1.15, available from the Simple Machines Forum Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3658.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey DOMAttrModified code execution
CVE-2011-3658.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the SVG implementation related to the removal of SVG elements during a DOMAttrModified event handler. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to trigger an out-of-bounds memory access and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause a denial of service.Refer to MFSA 2011-55 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-3661.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey YARR denial of service
CVE-2011-3661.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the YARR regular expression library when parsing javascript in Web content. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the browser to crash.Refer to MFSA 2011-54 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3663.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey SVG animation information disclosure
CVE-2011-3663.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper handling of SVG animation accessKey events when JavaScript is disabled. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to capture keystrokes.Refer to MFSA 2011-56 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-3665.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey OGG denial of service
CVE-2011-3665.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of OGG <video> elements. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the browser to crash.Refer to MFSA 2011-58 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. By sending a specially-crafted request using user_can_create_account parameter, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable application to create new accounts.Upgrade to the latest version of Bugzilla 3.4.13, 3.6.7, 4.0.3 or 4.2rc1, available from the Bugzilla Web site. CVE-2011-3830.title: Support Incident Tracker search.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3830.body: Support Incident Tracker is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the search_string parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3832.title: Support Incident Tracker config.php code execution
CVE-2011-3832.body: Support Incident Tracker could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the config.php script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the application_name parameter to inject and execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3835.title: Wuzly login.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3835.body: Wuzly is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the username parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3835.title: Wuzly multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3835.body: Wuzly is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using multiple parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3836.title: Wuzly unspecified cross-site request forgery
CVE-2011-3836.body: Wuzly is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3837.title: Wuzly index.php local file include
CVE-2011-3837.body: Wuzly could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the preview parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3838.title: Wuzly multiple scripts SQL injection
CVE-2011-3838.body: Wuzly is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the fp.php, newpage.php, newpost.php and login.php scripts using the 'u', epage, epost and username parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3839.title: Wuzly dXNlcm5hbWU cookie security bypass
CVE-2011-3839.body: Wuzly could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies. By modifying the dXNlcm5hbWU cookie value, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the vulnerable application.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3841.title: WP Symposium plugin for WordPress get_profile_avatar.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3841.body: WP Symposium plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the get_profile_avatar.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the uid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of WP Symposium plugin for WordPress (11.12.8 or later), available from the WP Symposium plugin for WordPress Web site. CVE-2011-3845.title: Apple Safari plug-in code execution
CVE-2011-3845.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the unloading of plug-ins when navigating to a new page while the victim interacts with the plug-in. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-3872.body: Puppet could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the insertion of the puppet master's DNS alt names into the X.509 Subject Alternative Name field of the certificate. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted certificate, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to cause the victim to accept spoofed certificates.Upgrade to the latest version of Puppet (4.0.1 or later), available from the Puppet Labs Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3875.title: Google Chrome drag and drop spoofing
CVE-2011-3875.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks. By performing a drag and drop operation, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed in the address bar to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information that could be used to launch further attacks against the victim's system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (15.0.874.102 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-3877.title: Google Chrome appcache internals page cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-3877.body: Google Chrome is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the appcache internals page to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. CVE-2011-4024.title: OCS Inventory NG unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4024.body: OCS Inventory NG is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by /ocsinventory. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the POST request to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of OCS Inventory NG (2.0.2 or later), available from the OCS Inventory Team Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4026.title: NexusPHP thanks.php SQL injection
CVE-2011-4026.body: NexusPHP is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the thanks.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4035.title: Multiple Schneider Electric products unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4035.body: Multiple Schneider Electric products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Schneider Electric Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4050.title: 7-Technologies Interactive Graphical SCADA System packets denial of service
CVE-2011-4050.body: 7-Technologies Interactive Graphical SCADA System (IGSS) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper bounds checking when processing malicious packets. By sending specially-crafted packets to TCP port 12401, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and cause the server to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (progupdatesv90.zip), available from the 7-Technologies Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4055.title: Siemens Tecnomatix FactoryLink ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2011-4055.body: The Siemens Tecnomatix FactoryLink ActiveX control is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the victim's browser to crash.Refer to Siemens Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4063.title: Asterisk SIP channel driver denial of service
CVE-2011-4063.body: Asterisk is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the use of uninitialized variables within the SIP channel driver. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Refer to AST-2011-012 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4079.title: OpenLDAP UTF8StringNormalize() denial of service
CVE-2011-4079.body: OpenLDAP is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an off-by-one error in the UTF8StringNormalize() function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an empty postalAddressAttribute value to cause the daemon to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the OpenLDAP GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2011-4088.title: abrt information disclosure
CVE-2011-4088.body: abrt could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the leaking of specific non-public information when reporting a crash. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain user credentials and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of abrt (2.0.7 or later), available from the abrt Web page. See References.

CVE-2011-4100.title: Wireshark CSN.1 dissector denial of service
CVE-2011-4100.body: Wireshark (formerly Ethereal) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an uninitialized variable in the CSN.1 dissector. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted packet trace file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Refer to wnpa-sec-2011-17 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4102.title: Wireshark ERF buffer overflow
CVE-2011-4102.body: Wireshark is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by ERF file parser. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted packet trace file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to wnpa-sec-2011-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4107.title: phpMyAdmin xml.php information disclosure
CVE-2011-4107.body: phpMyAdmin could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the simplexml_load_string() function in xml.php. By persuading a victim to import a specially-crafted XML file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of phpMyAdmin (3.4.7.1 or 3.3.10.5 or later), available from the phpMyAdmin Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4109.title: OpenSSL policy checks denial of service
CVE-2011-4109.body: OpenSSL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a double-free error within the policy checks. If X509_V_FLAG_POLICY_CHECK is set, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenSSL (0.9.8s or later), available from the OpenSSL Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-4122.title: OpenPAM pam_start() privilege escalation
CVE-2011-4122.body: OpenPAM and FreeBSD could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the invoking of the pam_start() function with a user provided service argument. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the system.For NetBSD: Refer to NetBSD-SA2011-008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4151.title: MIT Kerberos krb5_db2_lockout_audit denial of service
CVE-2011-4151.body: MIT Kerberos is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an assertion error in the krb5_ldap_lockout_audit() function in the Key Distribution Center (KDC). A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to cause the KDC daemon to crash.Refer to MITKRB5-SA-2011-006 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4157.title: HP StorageWorks P4000 Virtual SAN Appliance unspecified command execution
CVE-2011-4157.body: An unspecified vulnerability in HP StorageWorks P4000 Virtual SAN Appliance could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of StorageWorks P4000 Virtual SAN Appliance (9.5 or later), available from the HP Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4162.title: HP Device Access Manager for HP ProtectTools SidString argument code execution
CVE-2011-4162.body: HP Device Access Manager for HP ProtectTools could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the AddUser, AddUserEx, RemoveUser, RemoveUserByGuide, RemoveUserEx, and RemoveUserRegardless methods. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via an overly-long SidString argument to execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBHF02723 SSRT100536 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4171.title: IBM WebSphere ILOG Rule Team Server home.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4171.body: IBM WebSphere ILOG Rule Team Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the home.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the project parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM APAR RS00803 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4188.title: Novell iManager EnteredAttrName denial of service
CVE-2011-4188.body: Novell iManager is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper bounds checking by the jclient when handling the EnteredAttrName parameter. By using the Create Attribute function, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer cause the application to crash.Refer to Novell Document ID 7002971 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4189.title: Novell Groupwise Client .NAB buffer overflow
CVE-2011-4189.body: Novell Groupwise Client is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .NAB file containing an overly long email address, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Novell Document ID: 7010205 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4197.title: pfSense x509 security bypass
CVE-2011-4197.body: pfSense could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when handling x509 certificates. By creating a specially-crafted certificate issued by the built-in PKI mechanism, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass access controls and launch further attacks on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of pfSense (2.0.1 or later), available from the pfSense Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4211.title: Google App Engine Python SDK FakeFile privilege escalation
CVE-2011-4211.body: Google App Engine Python SDK could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the failure to control the opening of files by the FakeFile implementation within the sandbox environment. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using ALLOWED_MODES and ALLOWED_DIRS changes within the code parameter to bypass security restrictions and create arbitrary files on the system with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Google App Engine (1.5.4 or later), available from the Google Apps Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4212.title: Google App Engine Python SDK os.popen privilege escalation
CVE-2011-4212.body: Google App Engine Python SDK could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the failure to prevent os.popen calls by the sandbox environment. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a dev_appserver.RestrictedPathFunction._original_os reference within the code parameter to bypass security restrictions and execute arbitrary commands on the system with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Google App Engine (1.5.4 or later), available from the Google Apps Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4213.title: Google App Engine Python SDK os module privilege escalation
CVE-2011-4213.body: Google App Engine Python SDK could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the failure to prevent use of the os module by the sandbox environment. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a file_blob_storage.os reference within the code parameter to bypass security restrictions and execute arbitrary commands on the system with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Google App Engine (1.5.4 or later), available from the Google Apps Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4216.title: Investintech.com SlimPDF write operations code execution
CVE-2011-4216.body: Investintech.com SlimPDF Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the failure to properly restrict write operations. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4461.title: Jetty hash denial of service
CVE-2011-4461.body: Jetty is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by insufficient randomization of hash data structures. By sending multiple specially-crafted HTTP POST requests to an affected application containing conflicting hash key values, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of CPU resources.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.
