CVE-2011-4709.body: Hotaru CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Hotaru.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the return and search parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4709.title: Hotaru CMS Hotaru.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4709.body: Hotaru CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Hotaru.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the SITE_NAME field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4709.title: Hotaru CMS multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4709.body: Hotaru CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4711.title: Namazu namazu.cgi directory traversal
CVE-2011-4711.body: Namazu could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the namazu.cgi script containing dot dot sequences (/../) in the lang parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Namazu 2.0.16, available from the Namazu Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-0390.title: Cisco TelePresence Multipoint Switch XML-RPC denial of service
CVE-2011-0390.body: Cisco TelePresence Multipoint Switch is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the XML-RPC interface. By initiating a three-way handshake, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request to TCP port 9000 to cause the call geometry process to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-telepresence-ctms for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-0391.title: Cisco TelePresence Recording Server
CVE-2011-0391.body: Cisco TelePresence Recording Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Ad Hoc recording. By initiating a three-way handshake, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request to TCP 80 to cause all recording and playback threads on the device to be consumed.Refer to cisco-sa-20110223-telepresence-ctrs for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-1296.title: Google Chrome SVG text code execution
CVE-2011-1296.body: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a stale pointer in SVG text handling. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome (10.0.648.204 or later), available from the Google Chrome Releases Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-2039.title: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client helper application code execution
CVE-2011-2039.body: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper validation of the authenticity of the downloaded Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client executable when the client is deployed from the VPN headend. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to cisco-sa-20110601-ac for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-2527.title: Qemu -runas privilege escalation
CVE-2011-2527.body: Qemu could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper dropping of the extra groups when the -runas argument is specified. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain read or write access to specific files with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2011-2535.title: Asterisk IAX2 channel driver denial of service
CVE-2011-2535.body: Asterisk is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper validation of input by the IAX2 channel driver. By using a specially-crafted option control frame, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to an invalid pointer and cause the application to crash.Refer to AST-2011-010 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4712.title: Oxide M0N0X1D3 filenames directory traversal
CVE-2011-4712.body: Oxide M0N0X1D3 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4715.title: LibLime Koha opac-main.pl local file include
CVE-2011-4715.body: LibLime Koha could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the mainpage.pl and opac-main.pl scripts using the KohaOpacLanguage parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Koha (3.4.7 or 3.6.1 or later), available from the Koha Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4722.title: Ipswitch TFTP Server directory traversal
CVE-2011-4722.body: Ipswitch TFTP Server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted TFTP GET request to the TFTP Server containing dot dot sequences (/../) to view and download arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4725.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Server Administration Panel SQL injection
CVE-2011-4725.body: Parallels Plesk Panel is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the Server Administration Panel using specially-crafted input to a PHP script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4727.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Server Administration Panel denial of service
CVE-2011-4727.body: Parallels Plesk Panel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper validation of string data intended for XML storage by the Server Administration Panel. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted REST URL parameter to cause a denial of service.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4728.title: Parallels Plesk Panel flag information disclosure
CVE-2011-4728.body: Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the secure flag for a cookie in an https session by the Server Administration Panel. By intercepting its transmission within an http session, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4734.title: Parallels Plesk Panel input SQL injection
CVE-2011-4734.body: Parallels Plesk Panel is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using specially-crafted input to a PHP script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4735.title: Parallels Plesk Panel multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4735.body: Parallels Plesk Panel is vulnerable to multiple cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using specially-crafted input to a PHP script to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4736.title: Parallels Plesk Panel password information disclosure
CVE-2011-4736.body: Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the receipt of cleartext password input over HTTP. By sniffing the network, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4737.title: Parallels Plesk Panel response body information disclosure
CVE-2011-4737.body: Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the inclusion of a submitted password within an HTTP response body. By sniffing the network, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4738.title: Parallels Plesk Panel HTTPOnly information disclosure
CVE-2011-4738.body: Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the lack of a HTTPOnly flag in a Set-Cookie header for a cookie. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using script access to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4740.title: Parallels Plesk Panel links information disclosure
CVE-2011-4740.body: Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the generation of Web pages containing external links. By reading web-server access logs or web-server Referer logs, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4741.title: Parallels Plesk Panel database information disclosure
CVE-2011-4741.body: Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by Web pages containing a database connection string. By reading a page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4745.title: Parallels Plesk Panel billing system cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4745.body: Parallels Plesk Panel is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the billing system. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4747.title: Parallels Plesk Panel billing system security bypass
CVE-2011-4747.body: Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to prevent the use of weak ciphers for SSL sessions by the billing system. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted CipherSuite list to terminate cryptographic protection mechanisms.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4748.title: Parallels Plesk Panel billing information disclosure
CVE-2011-4748.body: Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by Web pages within the billing system containing email addresses not intended for use. By reading a page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4751.title: SmarterTools SmarterStats frmGettingStarted.aspx information disclosure
CVE-2011-4751.body: SmarterTools SmarterStats could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the generation of Web pages containing external links when responding to GET requests with query strings for frmGettingStarted.aspx. An attacker could exploit this using web-server access logs or web-server Referer logs to obtain information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4753.title: Parallels Plesk Small Business Panel sitebuilder_edit.php SQL injection
CVE-2011-4753.body: Parallels Plesk Small Business Panel is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the sitebuilder_edit.php script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4754.title: Parallels Plesk Small Business Panel smb/app/available/id/apscatalog/ URL cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4754.body: Parallels Plesk Small Business Panel is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the smb/app/available/id/apscatalog/ URL and multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4756.title: Parallels Plesk Small Business Panel sitebuilder_edit.php information disclosure
CVE-2011-4756.body: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a missing HTTPOnly flag in a Set-Cookie header for a cookie. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using vectors related to the domains/sitebuilder_edit.php script to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4758.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel cleartext password input over HTTP information disclosure
CVE-2011-4758.body: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. Password input over HTTP is received in cleartext. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4759.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel cross-domain Referer leakage information disclosure
CVE-2011-4759.body: An vulnerability related to cross-domain Referer leakage in the Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information from web-server access logs and web-server Referer logs via HTTP GET responses.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4760.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel local application deployment information disclosure
CVE-2011-4760.body: An vulnerability related to certain Web pages containing e-mail addresses that are not intended for communication regarding local application deployment in the Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information by accessing the smb/email-address/list page.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4763.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel Site Editor SQL injection
CVE-2011-4763.body: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the Site Editor, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4764.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel Site Editor multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4764.body: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Site Editor feature. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Wizard/Edit/Modules/Image page to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4765.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel HTTPOnly flag information disclosure
CVE-2011-4765.body: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. The Site Editor component does not contain the HTTPOnly flag in a Set-Cookie header. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via the Wizard/Edit/Modules/ImageGallery/MultiImagesUpload page cookie to obtain information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4767.title: Parallels Plesk Small Business Panel Site Editor Status.js information disclosure
CVE-2011-4767.body: An vulnerability related to certain Web pages containing e-mail addresses that are not intended for communication regarding local application deployment in the Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel Site Editor could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information by accessing the js/Wizard/Status.js script.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4776.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel admin/update/settings/ cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4776.body: Parallels Plesk Panel is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Control Panel feature. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the admin/update/settings/ page in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4782.title: phpMyAdmin ConfigFile.class.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4782.body: phpMyAdmin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ConfigFile.class.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the $host field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of phpMyAdmin (3.4.9 or later), available from the phpMyAdmin Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4783.title: IDAPython plugin for IDA Pro IDB code execution
CVE-2011-4783.body: The IDAPython plugin for IDA Pro could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the loading of malicious IDB files from the current directory. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted IDB file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary script on the system with the privileges of the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of IDAPython plugin for IDA Pro (1.5.2.3 or later), available from the Hex-Rays Web Site. See References.

CVE-2011-4784.title: NVIDIA Stereoscopic 3D Driver command execution
CVE-2011-4784.body: NVIDIA Stereoscopic 3D Driver could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper validation of specific commands to a named pipe. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system with Local System privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Stereoscopic 3D Driver (7.17.12.7565 or later), available from the NVIDIA Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4785.title: HP LaserJet P3015 unspecified unauthorized access
CVE-2011-4785.body: An unspecified error in HP LaserJet P3015 could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to specific files.Refer to HPSBPI02733 SSRT100646 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4815.title: Ruby hash denial of service
CVE-2011-4815.body: Ruby is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by insufficient randomization of hash data structures. By sending multiple specially-crafted HTTP POST requests to an affected application containing conflicting hash key values, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of CPU resources.Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.8.7-p357 or later), available from the Ruby Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4817.title: IBM Maximo Help menu information disclosure
CVE-2011-4817.body: IBM Maximo could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information. The Help menu About option displays the username. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the victim.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1584666 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4818.title: IBM Maximo uisessionid open redirect
CVE-2011-4818.body: IBM Maximo could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, caused by improper validation of user supplied input to the uisessionid parameter, resulting in an open redirect vulnerability. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted link, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information that could be used to launch further attacks against the victim.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1584666 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4819.title: IBM Maximo Asset Management uisesionid parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4819.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the /ui/ url-path and maximo.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the uisesionid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM Flash (Alert) 1584666 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4822.title: FishEye and Crucible comment cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4822.body: FishEye and Crucible are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using snippets in a user's comment to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of FishEye and Crucible (2.5.7 or later), available from the Atlassian Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4822.title: FishEye and Crucible multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4822.body: FishEye and Crucible are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the snippets in a user's comment and user profile display name to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of FishEye and Crucible (2.5.7 or later), available from the Atlassian Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4824.title: Cacti unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2011-4824.body: Cacti is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements an unspecified script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Cacti (0.8.7h or later), available from the Cacti Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4832.title: CaupoShop Pro index.php directory traversal
CVE-2011-4832.body: CaupoShop Pro could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script containing dot dot sequences (/../) in the template parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4833.title: SugarCRM index.php SQL injection
CVE-2011-4833.body: SugarCRM is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the where or order parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of SugarCRM (6.4.0 or later), available from the SugarCRM Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4834.title: HP Application Lifestyle Management GetInstalledPackages() symlink
CVE-2011-4834.body: HP Application Lifestyle Management could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack. The GetInstalledPackages() function creates temporary files insecurely. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a symbolic link from a temporary file to various files on the system, which could allow the attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system with elevated privileges.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4847.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel certificateslist SQL injection
CVE-2011-4847.body: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the certificateslist cookie parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4848.title: Parallels Plesk Panel Parallels Plesk Panel HTTP response body information disclosure
CVE-2011-4848.body: Parallels Plesk Panel Control Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. The HTTP response body contains submitted passwords. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4852.title: Parallels Plesk Panel external links information disclsoure
CVE-2011-4852.body: Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the generation of Web pages containing external links by the Control Panel. By reading the Web-server access logs or Web-server Referer logs, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4853.title: Parallels Plesk Panel RFC information disclosure
CVE-2011-4853.body: Parallels Plesk Panel could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the inclusion of an RFC 1918 IP address within a Web page by the Control Panel. By reading the page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4869.title: Unbound NSEC3 denial of service
CVE-2011-4869.body: Unbound is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing responses for NSEC3-signed zones. By sending a specially-crafted response, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause an assertion error.Upgrade to the latest version of Unbound (1.4.13p2 and 1.4.14 or later), available from the Unbound Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4875.title: Siemens Simatic WinCC HmiLoad.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2011-4875.body: Siemens Simatic WinCC is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by HmiLoad.exe. By sending specially-crafted packets, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Simatic WinCC (Flexible 2008 SP3 or later), available from the Siemens Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4877.title: Siemens Simatic WinCC HmiLoad.exe denial of service
CVE-2011-4877.body: Siemens Simatic WinCC is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error within HmiLoad.exe. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to stop responding or crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Simatic WinCC (Flexible 2008 SP3 or later), available from the Siemens Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4878.title: Siemens Simatic WinCC miniweb.exe directory traversal
CVE-2011-4878.body: Siemens Simatic WinCC could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the miniweb.exe program containing URL-encoded "dot dot" sequences (..%5C ..%5C) to traverse directories and read arbitrary files on the system.Refer to SSA-345442 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4879.title: Siemens Simatic WinCC miniweb.exe denial of service
CVE-2011-4879.body: Siemens Simatic WinCC is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error within the miniweb.exe program. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to an arbitrary invalid memory zone cause the server to crash.Refer to SSA-345442 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4887.title: Imperva SecureSphere Web Application Firewall unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4887.body: Imperva SecureSphere Web Application Firewall is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input passed to a web server. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the username field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SWRX-2012-002 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4890.title: solidDB rownum denial of service
CVE-2011-4890.body: solidDB is vulnerable to a denial of service, related to a SOLID SQL Error 86: illegal ROWNUM constraint condition when processing certain SQL statements. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a SELECT statement containing a rownum condition with a subquery to cause the database server to crash.Refer to IBM APAR IC80675 and IBM APAR IC79861 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2011-4920.title: e107 Inc. user signatures cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4920.body: e107 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the user signatures script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the link BCode field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of e107 (1.0 or later), available from the e107 Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4920.title: e107 Inc. multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4920.body: e107 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by thumb.php, rate.php and users.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using several parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of e107 (1.0.0 or later), available from the e107 Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4921.title: e107 Inc. usersettings.php SQL injection
CVE-2011-4921.body: e107 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the usersettings.php script using the username parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of e107 (1.0.0 or later), available from the e107 Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4923.title: BackupPC num parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4923.body: BackupPC is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.cgi script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the num parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for you system. See References.

CVE-2011-4926.title: Adminimize plugin for WordPress adminimize_page.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4926.body: Adminimize plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the adminimize_page.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress Adminimize Plugin (1.7.22 or later), available from the WordPress Adminimize Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-4946.title: e107 users_extended.php SQL injection
CVE-2011-4946.body: e107 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the users_extended.php script using the user_field parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-4947.title: e107 users_extended.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2011-4947.body: e107 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the users_extended.php script. CVE-2011-4968.title: nginx SSL spoofing
CVE-2011-4968.body: nginx could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the improper validation of SSL certificates while using proxy functionality. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted certificate, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to cause the victim to accept spoofed certificates.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Nginx Web site. See References.

CVE-2011-5003.title: Avid Media AvidPhoneticIndexer.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2011-5003.body: Avid Media is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the AvidPhoneticIndexer.exe binary. By sending specially crafted packets to TCP port 4659, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2011-5008.title: CoDeSys GatewayService buffer overflow
CVE-2011-5008.body: CoDeSys is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow within the GatewayService. See References.

CVE-2011-5011.title: xt:Commerce customers.php and accounting.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2011-5011.body: xt:Commerce is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the customers.php and accounting.php scripts. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to change the status of a user from 'New user' to 'Admin'. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.
